info.task: read checked menuitemradio in a group in a submenu
info.title: Read checked menu item radio in interaction mode

setupScript.name: focusonstylecolor
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Style/Color' menu item
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the "Style/Color" menu item
testPageDocument.querySelectorAll('[role=menuitem]')[1].focus();

user: Navigate to 'Black' menu item radio with down arrow.
instructions.raw: Open "Style/Color" menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Black' menu item radio with down arrow. | Read the  'Black' menu item radio
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the 'Text Color' group are conveyed
The name and role of the 'Text Color' group are conveyed
